_description: Barbour’s Bruce — about 13,550 lines in couplets

CamStJohn191.First Lines:
…It was gret pite for to heirffolk till be tribulit on
                    þis maner…
CamStJohn191.Last Lines:
…Bryng ws hye vp till hevynis blisQuhar all wayis liff and
                    liking is
CamStJohn191.Attributed Title:
Explicit liber excellentissimi et nobilissimi principis roberti de broys
                        scottorum regis illustrissimi qui hec liber scriptus fuit & finitus in
                        vigilia sancti iohannis baptiste videlicet decollacio eiusdem per manum I de
                        R capellam anno domini Millesimo Quadrangentesimo octogesimo septimo (f.
                        163v)

NLS1922.First Lines:
Storyis to rede ar delitabillSuppose þat þai be nocht bot
                    fabill…
NLS1922.Last Lines:
…bring ws hey till hure mekill blisquhar alwayis lestand
                    liking Is
